hero.description: Modern residential and commercial interiors. Unique approach, support and turnkey implementation.

about.title: About studio
about.paragraph1: CIRCLE is a design and interior implementation studio. We create thoughtful residential and commercial spaces — from concept to complete turnkey implementation.
about.paragraph2: A team of professionals works on each project, for whom design is not just a job, but a constant process of search, development and precision in details.

row1.title:
COMPREHENSIVE
APPROACH
row1.text: We manage the project from drawings and sketches to the finished interior and furnishing.

row2.title:
COMFORT
AND STYLE
row2.text: We don't draw "pictures", we create living spaces for your life scenarios.

row3.title:
PRECISE
TECHNICAL
DOCUMENTATION
row3.text: We provide a complete package of clear, accurate and professional technical drawings for builders

econom.name: Econom
details: • Layout solution with furniture arrangement up to 5 options
• Collage of materials and furniture, no 3D
• Statement of finishing materials and furniture

business.name: Business
details: • Layout solution with furniture arrangement up to 10 options
• Statement of finishing materials and furniture

premium.name: Premium
details: • Selection of builders for your budget
• Project estimate with prices and suppliers
• Budget and material procurement schedule management
• Invoice verification and material delivery control
• Regular site visits (1-2 times a week)

contact.title: Have questions?
contact.subtitle: Leave a request and we will contact you!
